name: Error 0: New World Found
description:
"Where does the simulation end, and life begin?"

There isn't much to say about you. You're simply a teen hoping to enjoy what little of his life he can with his friends, before he's old enough to start living like an adult.  So, near the end of the year, you call your friends to have one last outing together before the next year starts. It's a great chance to try out a new event coming out that day, where a new type of VR is finally released to the world! The best part? It's dirt cheap to attend! Somethings doesn't feel entirely right though...

Error 0: New World found, or Error 0: N.W.F, is a gay furry fantasy visual novel with sci-fi elements that has three romanceable characters. At the moment, it is only a very short demo rife with issues, but I hope to improve it as much as I can over the course of Error 0's development. So to this end, please give me any criticism you have, and if you want to give me any help I'll be glad to accept it.

Most everything was done by me, Apropos;

The coding/sprites/writing/story idea are mine, art was drawn on computer with mouse.

Backgrounds (With one or two exceptions made by me) were plucked from the internet and edited.

Music was done by Kevin MacLeod and downloaded from here: Royalty Free Music (incompetech.com
